A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I start this by saying that I am a huge Star Wars fanatic\, this movie is garbage. It's the result of the slow disneyfication of this historic universe\, turning it from a master piece into a steaming pile of S*** mixed with a lot of cheap jokes and gags pandering to all the eight year olds in the audience. Star Wars as we knew it is gone. R.I.P.
